title: England

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a gate to tax.
- Choose a gate to lock. (Costs 2 gold)
- Lock all gates. (Costs 5 gold) (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The town is divided into three equal “regions,” with gates in between each of them. (In a standard 15-player game, the gates will be 5|6, 10|11, 15|1. In non-standard games, England will be informed of where the gates are placed.) Each player can travel through at most one gate to reach their destination.
- You will generate 1 gold for each non-Civ person who travels through the taxed gate.
- You may not tax and lock on the same night.
- Locking a gate prevents all travel through that gate. Civilizations are immune.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were shot by an English Redcoat.” (Factional Kill)
“You were stopped by a locked gate!” (Trying to pass through locked gate)

desc:
Post 2142
*“We are not interested in the possibilities of defeat. They do not exist.” -Queen Victoria*
